pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantitative Analysis Made Accessible // This is a new version of the 'userfriendlyscience' package, which has grown a bit unwieldy. This first submission contains a number of basic functions to easily format values, work with scales, and format vectors in a single character value. Over time, more functions presently in 'userfriendlyscience' will be migrated over to this package.
